summary: Changes the main font to Exocet (heavy or light version) from the Diablo game series.
descriptionHtml:
This modification changes the main font to Exocet (heavy or light version) from the Diablo game series.

-------------------

Version 1.1 changes:
Added alternative versions, where letter \"t\" is replaced with scaled capital T. Check the screenshots.

Version 1.2 changes:
-Added new version of Alternative Exocet light, where the \"square\" problems in New save option and with the accented letters is fixed.

-------------------

Notes:
-This is compatible with SkyUI and SkyUI-Away. In fact, this mod works even better with them.
-Due to wideness of this font, minor text fitting problems still persist in the Level up menu, where you must choose to progress either magicka, health or stamina and in the Load game notification where it says \"all unsaved progress will be lost\".

-------------------

Manual install:
Extract the files and move them into your Skyrim/Data/Interface folder. Overwrite if necessary. Please remember to back up your old files in case you need them later (if you have any).

Manual uninstall:
To uninstall, delete files named fonts_en2.swf and fontconfig.txt from your Skyrim/Data/Interface folder.

-------------------

Feel free to give me feedback. Also, check out my other font mod; Smaller Kingthings Petrock fonts at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20773
author: Eckhart
